RingC1Page.banner.title: HeyTCM C1 Smart Health Ring
RingC1Page.intro.title: HeyTCM C1 Smart Health Ring
RingC1Page.intro.subtitle: Blending TCM wisdom with modern technology for a new data-driven wellness experience.

RingC1Page.features.title: Intelligent TCM Health Management
RingC1Page.features.desc: Integrates TCM theory and modern sensor technology for real-time health monitoring and intelligent analysis of constitution and health trends.

RingC1Page.features.title: Multi-dimensional Data Collection
RingC1Page.features.desc: Supports collection of heart rate, temperature, sleep, activity and more for personalized wellness.

RingC1Page.features.title: AI-powered Decision Making
RingC1Page.features.desc: Built-in AI algorithms provide personalized health advice and TCM-based wellness plans.

RingC1Page.faqs.q: Who is the C1 Ring suitable for?
RingC1Page.faqs.a: Ideal for those who care about health and want to embrace data-driven wellness, especially TCM enthusiasts.

RingC1Page.faqs.q: How can I purchase the C1 Ring?
RingC1Page.faqs.a: You can reserve or buy through the HeyTCM official website or partner channels.
